WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thanks for reporting, but as MgSam mentioned this is a known limitation for 0.9 alpha
WorkItem.Description:
After updating to Typescript 0.9 alpha the refactoring (invoked by F2 or context menu) dissapeared.

Expected: designer should allow  code refactoring.

Comments.Message: P.S. - find all references dissapeared, too.

Oops, 'find all references' is present.
only 'refactor' dissapeared.
Read the [blog announcement](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/typescript/archive/2013/04/22/announcing-0-9-early-previews.aspx). Specifically, the "Known Caveats" section about 0.9 previews.
